a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Payloads and rocket bodies in space, by orbit
Debris from launches or collisions is not counted. Objects are subtracted from the time series after they have
Data source: United States Space Force (2025)

Note:
Low Earth orbit
is defined here by a closest approach to Earth below 2,000 kilometers;
medium Earth orbit
between 2,000 and 35,586
